title: Night Chop Fishing with Light
brief: Use artificial light to attract fish at night, then stun them with the back of a machete blade.
steps: Step 1: Find an area with good fish density at night.
Step 2: Use any available light source to attract fish to the surface.
Step 3: Strike fish with the back side (dull edge) of a machete or similar blade.
Step 4: Gather stunned fish immediately before they sink or float away.
warnings: Never use the sharp edge of the blade as it will cut fish in half and you'll lose portions.
This method works best in areas with high fish concentration.
